snippet: It was only a matter of time before a hip-hop star would blow through the lines separating pop from rap and appeal to two lucrative audiences at once.
abstract: Editorial contends that the meteoric rise to fame of Nicki Minaj is remarkable in that she is the first hip-hop star who appeals to pop and rap audiences; laments that the criticism she has faced underlines the unrelieved gender gap in the hip-hop world.
lead_paragraph: It was only a matter of time before a hip-hop star would blow through the lines separating pop from rap and appeal to two lucrative audiences at once.

headline.print_headline: Nicki Minaj Crashes Hip-Hop’s Boys Club
headline.main: Nicki Minaj Crashes Hip-Hop’s Boys Club
